response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to us due to its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the value it can bring to someone like yourself, I would like to propose an offer of $7,500 for the product. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that could significantly enhance your experience or business operations. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you have any questions about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
